subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0071_01C9DEE3.F40E9A70
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

In a way, I agree. "Stuck" implies accidental. If a ghost is hanging around=
, it there by choice, whether it is fully aware of that or not.

  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=
 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 3:55 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Bo=
x Demo at Moundsville WV






   I don't believe in trapped/lost souls, I =
think that's Hollywood. The trouble with doing investigations, I think, is =
you get the evidence you expect to get, so it will tend to support the conc=
ept of stuck souls. When I record it supports my concept of sprits travel, =
and hauntings are for show. Which is correct?--both at one time or another.=
 

   I did a recording at lunch time, at home, and in it a voice says "gho=
st--right behind you". I was recording open air with the test board running=
.  

   Frank-S


  On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 1:54 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wr=
ote:





    Well, stand outside the thing, and help those poor souls out,=
 here they are making money at the cost of lost souls who are asking for he=
lp.  Shame on them, don't they realize  how many lost souls there are out t=
here, waiting, go back (a few thousand years worth of them,)  were I to nam=
e all the tribes, country, religions, throughout the years, people that die=
d trapped, in various places over century's, and yes there are thousand's o=
f them in the world, just dwelling in a cell of their own making, no progre=
ssion, no light, no hope, without people they love, and who wait still lovi=
ng them, they exist in these dark places without God.  This mission should =
be to help them get back to God, back to the light of God, light of Univers=
e however, we want to call it, but in that light is love and happiness.  Ju=
st my take, sf

    In a message dated 5/27/2009 3:42:33 P.M. Eastern Dayli=
ght Time, foreverhaunted57@... writes:




      Yes, you need specia=
l permission. I was there for an all night ghost hunt as a guest of Eastern=
 Paranormal. The place can be rented at night but believe me when I say "it=
 ain't cheap". Plus I don't think the prison would appreciate me releasing =
the inmates before their eternal sentence has been served.
      Steve




=
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
=
      From: "SnowfireL@..." <SnowfireL@...>

      To: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups.com

      Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 2:31:57 PM 

      Subject=
: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




      Does one need sp=
ecial permission to get in there?  You folks should go back, and release th=
em since a few of them already know you Steve, this is Steve?  Right?  sf

=
      In a message dated 5/27/2009 2:15:10 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, fore=
verhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




        Unfortunately I did not get to =
attempt to cross them. After my demonstration, another group that was also =
there started complaining that the box made too much noise and was henderin=
g their investigation so I turned it off. I wouldn't want my direct communi=
cation with the deceased inmates to mess up their EVP work, now would I? I =
apoligized and put it away for the rest of the night.
         According to=
 the prison staff, the inmates firmly believed that if they died in prison =
their souls would be forever trapped there. This belief was so strong that =
the prison officials would take the elderly inmates who were dying of natur=
al causes to a local hospital so they would'nt have to die in the prison. M=
aybe their beliefs were well founded.     




----------------------------=
--------------------------------------------
        From: "SnowfireL@aol. =
com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

        Se=
nt: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 12:36:12 PM 

        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Gh=
ost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




        This is a wonderful recording, w=
ere you able to free any of them?  So sad to see them still there behind ba=
rs, must be very lonely for them, they should be moving on so, they can sta=
rt to work on making up for things on the other side.  You folks should go =
up there again, and hold a small prayer vigil for them, of course they woul=
d no longer be ghosts trapped there, but there are plenty more around. sf

=
        In a message dated 5/27/2009 12:10:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, f=
oreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:



          I was invited to spend the =
night in the West Virginia Penitentiary this past weekend.. I was asked to =
give a short demonstration with my Optimus 12-797 hacked radio. Deep inside=
 the prison surrounded by concrete and steel, the radio could not pick up a=
ny radio stations in manual mode. I wasn't sure how this might effect the d=
emonstration. I was pleasantly surprised with the results. I recorded the s=
ession and the results can be heard at this link. http://www.youtube. com/w=
atch? v=3DKwDYu4RULlk
